title: Print, "Design for Cartouche with Putti Supporting Helmet, in Livre Nouveau de Morceaux de Fantaisie (New Book of Works of Fantasy)", 1695–1768
medium: Engraving and etching on laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: F. de. Cuvilliés. In. et. del.;  lower right: CA. de Lespilliez Sc.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower center: C. P. S. C. M.
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Large rocaille-framed cartouche depicting two putti holding a staff with helmet, above, winged figure blowing horn. Left, plant bearing fruit topped with putto holding helmet and axe with escutcheon, leading to curled branches some of which turn into geometrical trellis-like design. Right of cartouche, stairs with wall and vase.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Cartouche with Putti Supporting Helmet, in Livre Nouveau de Morceaux de Fantaisie (New Book of Works of Fantasy)", 1695–1768.
1695–1768. Engraving and etching on laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-282-20.
